Deno x Astro

This is an example of an Astro app running on Deno.

Install

You can scaffold this sample app on your local machine with the following command:

$ deno run --allow-write --allow-net https://raw.githubusercontent.com/denoland/examples/main/init.ts with-astro ./path/to/directory

Other Resources

  • Getting Started Guide
  • Source on GitHub

This app is part of a larger set of sample starter apps that can help you get started with Deno and Deno Deploy.
